name: Blur
description: A unit initiating combat against a unit occupying a Blur tile instead targets the unit that created the tile as if it occupied the Blur tile. The original occupant of the Blur tile performs any counterattacks. If the original occupant cannot double on their counterattack, the creator of the Blur Tile may perform the second attack if they could double. The Blur Tile is then destroyed.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
